channel.title: CVE Feed for RedHat -- undertow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RedHat -- undertow

item.title: CVE-2019-10212|2024-08-04T22:17:18.906Z -- redhat -- undertow
item.description: A flaw was found in, all under 2.0.20, in the Undertow DEBUG log for io.undertow.request.security. If enabled, an attacker could abuse this flaw to obtain the user's credentials from the log files.
